title: Stakeholders Domain Schema
description: Schema for individuals, groups, or entities that influence or are influenced by the value delivered within an organization

stakeholders.description: Individuals, groups, or entities that influence or are influenced by the organization's activities

title.description: The name or title of the Stakeholder

type.description: The Stakeholder's position in relation to the Organization

description.description: A detailed explanation of the Stakeholder group

role.description: Defined responsibilities and interests of the Stakeholder

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) to which the Stakeholder is most closely linked

engagementStrategies.description: Plans to communicate and interact with this Stakeholder

interestLevels.description: Degree of influence and interest each Stakeholder has in Organization activities

inputs.description: Resources or information Stakeholders provide to the Organization

outputs.description: Benefits or outcomes Stakeholders receive from the Organization

dependencies.description: Other Stakeholders, processes or systems that the Stakeholder depends on

relatedStakeholders.description: Stakeholders that are related or linked to this Stakeholder

performanceIndicators.description: Metrics used to measure the effectiveness of Stakeholder engagement

risks.description: Potential risks associated with Stakeholder engagement

improvementOpportunities.description: Areas where Stakeholder engagement can be enhanced or improved

strategicAlignment.description: How the Stakeholder aligns with the Organization's strategic goals and objectives

stakeholderRequirements.description: Specific needs or expectations from stakeholders that the organization must address

title.description: The name or title of the Stakeholder requirement

description.description: A detailed explanation of the Stakeholder requirement

purpose.description: The intended purpose or benefit of the Stakeholder requirement

owner.description: The individual or team responsible for fulfilling the requirement

orgUnitTitle.description: The Organization unit(s) impacted by the requirement

acceptanceCriteria.description: The criteria for accepting the Stakeholder requirement

dependencies.description: The dependencies related to the Stakeholder requirement

regulatoryCompliance.description: The regulatory requirements associated with the Stakeholder requirement
